subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Edwards, now with Joe Gibbs Racing, won for the first time since June 22 as his fuel-mileage strategy left him out front while Martin Truex Jr., Denny Hamlin and others were forced to head to pit road late.
snippet: Edwards, now with Joe Gibbs Racing, won for the first time since June 22 as his fuel-mileage strategy left him out front while Martin Truex Jr., Denny Hamlin and others were forced to head to pit road late.
